text: The Pelagiidae are a family of jellyfish. Members of the family Pelagiidae have no ring canal, and the marginal tentacles arise from umbrella margin. ==Genera== There are four genera currently recognized: *Genus Chrysaora – (14 species) *Genus Mawia – Mawia benovici *Genus Pelagia – Pelagia noctiluca *Genus Sanderia – (2 species) ==References== Category:Cnidarian families Category:Semaeostomeae
title: Pelagiidae
